item.title: 芯片制造商 Wolfspeed 股价暴跌逾 45%，创 27 年新低
item.description: Wolfspeed 的股价周五暴跌约 48%，创下自 1998 年以来的最低点，一天前这家芯片制造商在努力改善财务状况的同时任命了新的首席执行官。【原文：Wolfspeed's shares slumped about 48% on Friday, hitting their lowest since 1998, a day after the chipmaker appointed a new CEO amid its struggles to improve its financial position.】

item.title: 独家报道美联储主席戴利称今年降息两次 "合理"，企业将适应关税调整
item.description: 旧金山联邦储备银行行长玛丽-戴利（Mary Daly）仍然认为，今年降息两次是 "合理的 "预测，但在劳动力市场稳固、经济仍在增长、通胀趋于下降的情况下，决策者可以等待降息，直到他们评估企业将如何调整关税成本。【原文：San Francisco Federal Reserve Bank President Mary Daly still sees two interest-rate cuts this year as a "reasonable" projection, but with the labor market solid, the economy still growing and inflation edging down, policymakers can wait to reduce rates until they assess how businesses will adjust to tariff costs.】

item.title: 英伟达支持的 CoreWeave 公司股价可能比首次公开募股价格高出最多 25
item.description: CoreWeave 公司周五在纳斯达克首次上市时，股价最高将比发行价高出 25%。【原文：CoreWeave's shares were set to open up to 25% above their offer price in the company's debut on the Nasdaq on Friday.】

item.title: 五家航空公司同意解决英国对跨大西洋航线的反垄断担忧
item.description: 英国竞争监管机构周五表示，包括英国航空公司（British Airways）和美国航空公司（American Airlines）在内的五家航空公司已作出承诺，以解决人们对其英美客运航线合作协议的担忧。【原文：Britain's competition regulator said on Friday five airlines, including British Airways and American Airlines , have offered commitments to resolve concerns over their agreement to cooperate on passenger routes between the UK and the U.S.】

item.title: 智利铜矿商 Codelco 将于 2024 年实现盈利
item.description: 智利 Codelco 公司（COBRE.UL）是世界上最大的铜生产商，该公司周五公布的 2024 年财报显示，其税前利润为 7.9 亿美元，而上一年则亏损 7.57 亿美元。【原文：Chile's Codelco (COBRE.UL), the world's largest copper producer, on Friday reported a swing into the black for its 2024 earnings, posting a pre-tax profit of $790 million compared to a loss of $757 million the previous year.】

item.title: 美国股票基金创 11 月以来最大单周流入量
item.description: 截至 3 月 26 日的一周内，美国股票基金需求旺盛，因为特朗普政府发出了更加谨慎的关税政策信号，帮助投资者将注意力重新转移到企业盈利增长的前景上。【原文：U.S. equity funds witnessed robust demand in the week through March 26 as signals of a more measured tariff approach from the Trump administration helped shift investor focus back to prospects of growth in corporate earnings.】

item.title: 菲利普斯 66 董事在代理权争夺战中批评激进投资者埃利奥特
item.description: 菲利普斯 66 的独立董事鲍勃-皮斯（Bob Pease）周五为公司业绩辩护，并批评了埃利奥特投资管理公司（Elliott Investment Management），这家美国炼油企业与激进投资者之间的董事会之争愈演愈烈。【原文：Phillips 66's independent director, Bob Pease, defended the company's performance and criticized Elliott Investment Management on Friday, as a boardroom battle between the U.S. refiner and the activist investor intensified.】

item.title: 谷歌将支付 1 亿美元解决广告商集体诉讼
item.description: 谷歌已同意支付 1 亿美元现金，以了结一项长期诉讼，该诉讼称谷歌未能提供承诺的折扣，并对广告客户目标地理区域以外的广告点击收费，从而向广告客户多收费用。【原文：Google has agreed to pay $100 million in cash to settle a long-running lawsuit claiming it overcharged advertisers by failing to provide promised discounts and charged for clicks on ads outside the geographic areas the advertisers targeted.】

item.title: 创纪录的液化天然气流量抵消了创纪录的产量，美国天然气价格保持稳定
item.description: 美国天然气期货周五持稳，原因是液化天然气（LNG）出口厂创纪录的流量抵消了日产量的下降，以及本周和下周需求低于此前预期的预测。【原文：U.S. natural gas futures held steady on Friday as record flows to liquefied natural gas (LNG) export plants offset a decline in daily output and forecasts for lower demand than previously expected this week and next.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，力拓正在与刚果商谈开发锂矿床事宜
item.description: 彭博新闻社周五援引知情人士的话报道称，力拓已与刚果民主共和国就开发世界上最大的硬岩锂矿之一进行了会谈。【原文：Rio Tinto has held talks with the Democratic Republic of Congo about developing one of the world's biggest hard rock lithium deposits, Bloomberg News reported on Friday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 全球股票基金因早期乐观情绪而强劲流入，但贸易担忧重现
item.description: 截至 3 月 26 日的一周内，全球股票基金吸引了大量资金流入，股市最初因对唐纳德-特朗普总统的政府将更有选择性地征收关税而非实施广泛贸易限制的乐观情绪而反弹。【原文：Global equity funds attracted large inflows in the week through March 26 when equity markets initially rebounded on optimism that President Donald Trump's administration would apply tariffs more selectively rather than impose broad trade restrictions.】

item.title: 中国市场监管部门表示将审查长江和记的巴拿马港口交易
item.description: 中国市场监管部门周五发表声明称，将依法审查香港企业集团长江和记将其在巴拿马运河附近的两个港口业务出售给贝莱德领导的集团的交易，以保护公平竞争，维护公众利益。【原文：China's market regulator said in a statement on Friday it will review Hong Kong conglomerate CK Hutchison's deal to sell its two port operations near the Panama Canal to a BlackRock-led group in accordance with law to protect fair competition and safeguard public interests.】

item.title: VIEW 美国 2 月 PCE 物价指数显示通胀形势依然严峻
item.description: 美国商务部周五公布，2月份个人消费支出（PCE）价格指数增长0.3%，而1月份为增长0.3%，未作修正。经济学家此前预计 PCE 物价指数将增长 0.3%。【原文：The Personal Consumption Expenditures (PCE) price index increased 0.3% in February after advancing by an unrevised 0.3% in January, the U.S. Commerce Department said on Friday. Economists had forecast the PCE price index gaining 0.3%.】

item.title: 国媒称中国将坚决应对美国对等关税
item.description: 中国国家广播公司中央电视台下属的一个社交媒体账户周五称，如果美国即将对中国征收互惠关税，损害中国利益，中国将采取坚决反制措施。【原文：China will take resolute countermeasures if the United States harm the country's interests with its upcoming reciprocal tariffs, a social media account affiliated with Chinese state broadcaster CCTV said on Friday.】

item.title: 特朗普发布行政令后，詹纳-布洛克公司起诉美国政府
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）发布行政命令，暂停了詹纳-布洛克（Jenner & Block）律师事务所律师的安全许可，并限制他们进入政府大楼、接触官员和参与联邦合同工作，该律师事务所于周五起诉了美国政府。【原文：The law firm Jenner & Block sued the U.S. government on Friday, after President Donald Trump issued an executive order suspending security clearances for its lawyers and restricting access to government buildings, officials and federal contracting work.】

item.title: 博鳌亚洲论坛称，由于Wegovy和Ozempic销售滞后，诺和诺德第一季度业绩可能不及预期
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America）分析师周五表示，诺和诺德公司第一季度业绩可能会低于预期，因为其畅销药品Wegovy和Ozempic的销售滞后，这可能会促使这家丹麦制药商下调2025年的季度业绩指导。【原文：Bank of America analysts on Friday said Novo Nordisk may miss first-quarter expectations, as sales of its blockbuster Wegovy and Ozempic drugs lag, which could prompt the Danish drugmaker to cut its 2025 guidance in its quarterly results.】

item.title: 美国 2 月消费者支出增长；核心通胀率更为坚挺
item.description: 美国消费者支出在 2 月份出现反弹，这很可能是受到物价上涨的提振，而物价上涨可能会加剧人们的担忧，即在贸易紧张局势升级的情况下，美国经济将面临一段增长乏力、通胀高企的时期。【原文：U.S. consumer spending rebounded in February, likely lifted by higher prices, which could amplify fears that the economy was facing a period of tepid growth and high inflation amid an escalation in trade tensions.】

item.title: 早间竞价贸易忧虑根深蒂固
item.description: 当今美国和全球市场的重要事件【原文：What matters in U.S. and global markets today】

item.title: 独家报道阿拉斯加州州长将向特朗普介绍亚洲天然气发展情况
item.description: 阿拉斯加州州长表示，他将在下周从日本返回后向美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的政府介绍确保亚洲支持天然气项目的进展情况，该项目已成为有关贸易和关税的更广泛讨论的一部分。【原文：Alaska's governor said he will brief U.S. President Donald Trump's administration after returning from Japan next week on progress securing Asian backing for a natural gas project that has become part of a broader discussion on trade and tariffs.】

item.title: 乌克兰官员称，乌克兰努力确保与美国达成的矿产协议反映其利益
item.description: 乌克兰副总理尤利娅-斯维里坚科（Yulia Svyrydenko）周五表示，乌克兰正在努力确保与美国达成的矿产协议能够反映乌克兰的所有利益，并体现战略伙伴精神。【原文：Ukraine is working to ensure that a minerals deal with the U.S. reflects all its interests and is in a spirit of strategic partnership, Ukrainian Deputy Prime Minister Yulia Svyrydenko said on Friday.】

item.title: Lululemon 因关税不确定性和需求疲软打击预期而暴跌
item.description: Lululemon Athletica 的股价在周五的盘前交易中下跌了近 13%，此前这家运动服装生产商提供了不乐观的年度预测，因为更广泛的服装领域正在与不均衡的消费需求环境作斗争。【原文：Lululemon Athletica shares fell nearly 13% in premarket trading on Friday, after the sportswear maker provided downbeat annual forecasts as the broader apparel space battles an uneven consumer demand environment.】

item.title: CoreWeave 的零售吸引力可能会受到上市时机和财务压力的影响
item.description: CoreWeave 的债务堆积和其他财务挑战引发的担忧可能会影响散户投资者的热情，因为该公司正准备上市，而分析师认为其上市时机不对。【原文：Concerns sparked by CoreWeave's debt pile and other financial challenges may weigh on retail investor enthusiasm as it prepares to go public after what analysts said was a poorly timed IPO.】

item.title: 柏林谈针对美国科技巨头的措施："没有什么是不可能的
item.description: 德国政府发言人周五表示，关于针对美国关税威胁的惩罚性措施，"没有什么是不可能的"。【原文：A German government spokesperson said on Friday that "nothing is off the table" with regards to punitive measures in response to the threat of U.S. tariffs.】

item.title: 欧盟将在人工智能、网络安全和数字技能领域投资 14 亿美元
item.description: 欧盟委员会周五在一份声明中说，欧盟委员会将在2025年至2027年通过数字欧洲计划在人工智能、网络安全和数字技能方面投资13亿欧元（14亿美元）。【原文：The European Commission will invest 1.3 billion euros ($1.4 billion) in artificial intelligence, cybersecurity and digital skills through the Digital Europe Programme for 2025 to 2027, it said in a statement on Friday.】

item.title: 据《南华早报》报道，长江和记下周不会出售巴拿马运河的战略港口
item.description: 据《南华早报》周五报道，香港企业集团长江和记将不会在下周签署向贝莱德领导的财团出售巴拿马运河两个港口的协议。【原文：Hong Kong conglomerate CK Hutchison will not be signing the deal to sell its two ports at the Panama Canal to a BlackRock-led consortium next week, the South China Morning Post reported on Friday.】

item.title: 调查显示，地缘政治忧虑促使超过 60% 的公司延长外汇对冲期限
item.description: 软件供应商 MillTechFX 周五进行的一项调查显示，全球每三家公司中就有两家计划改变其货币对冲措施，增加对冲额度或延长对冲时间，以应对日益紧张的地缘政治局势。【原文：Two out of three companies around the world are planning to change their currency hedges by adding to them, or keeping them for longer in response to growing geopolitical tensions, a survey on Friday from software provider MillTechFX showed.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，长江和记考虑分拆全球电信资产，着眼于伦敦上市
item.description: 两位知情人士透露，香港企业集团长江和记控股有限公司已开始准备在全球范围内分拆其电信资产，并在伦敦证券交易所上市。【原文：Hong Kong conglomerate CK Hutchison Holdings Ltd has started preparations to spin-off its telecommunication assets globally and list the business on the London Stock Exchange, two people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 中国比亚迪在意大利签署汽车零部件分销协议
item.description: 中国电动汽车制造商比亚迪周五表示，该公司与意大利公司Intergea签署了一项汽车零部件分销协议，这是其加强在欧洲重要市场的战略的一部分。【原文：Chinese electric automaker BYD said on Friday it signed a car parts distribution deal with Italian company Intergea, as part of its strategy to boost its presence in a key European market.】

item.title: 分拆 Amrize 后，Holcim 将以并购交易为目标促进增长
item.description: 瑞士水泥生产商 Holcim 公司周五表示，该公司的目标是到 2030 年，息税前利润年均增长 6% 至 10%，其中部分动力来自兼并和收购。【原文：Holcim is targeting average annual growth in earnings before interest and taxes of 6% to 10% by 2030, driven in part by mergers and acquisitions, the Swiss cement maker said on Friday.】

item.title: 华尔街严阵以待特朗普的关税政策；不确定性迷雾仍未散去
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）定于4月2日宣布的关税政策可能会拨开今年以来笼罩金融市场的不确定性迷雾，但很少有投资者期望得到他们所寻求的明确指导。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump's scheduled April 2 tariff policy announcement could clear a fog of uncertainty that has clouded financial markets this year, yet few investors expect to get the definitive guidance they seek.】
